title: Generated Prompt for AI AGENT_INSTRUCTIONS
context: You are creating AI agent instructions. Available tools: 5 MCP servers.
instructions: 1. Analyze the provided context and requirements carefully
2. Structure your response according to the specified format
3. Include all required elements while respecting constraints
4. Define clear tool schemas and function signatures
5. Include comprehensive error handling and safety rails

safety: No harmful, biased, or inappropriate content
Respect privacy and PII handling requirements
Comply with platform and organizational policies

output_format.format: Use clean Markdown formatting with headers and sections
output_format.verbosity: Be brief and direct, include only essential information

examples: Include 1-2 relevant examples for ai_agent_instructions context

quality_criteria.clarity: Instructions are unambiguous and easy to follow
quality_criteria.safety: Complies with all safety and policy requirements
quality_criteria.domain_appropriateness: Content is suitable for the specified domain

safety_guidelines: Content must be appropriate and non-harmful
Respect user privacy and data protection
Avoid bias and ensure inclusive language
